scripts.android:bundle: SET NODE_ENV=prod & cd android & gradlew clean bundleRelease & cd..
scripts.android:rapk: SET NODE_ENV=prod & cd android & gradlew clean app:assembleRelease & cd..
scripts.android:dapk: SET NODE_ENV=prod & cd android & gradlew clean assembleDebug & cd..
scripts.start: SET NODE_ENV=dev & cd android & gradlew clean & cd.. & concurrently "npm run npmstart" "npm run serve"
